message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its features and benefits, I'm initially offering it for $18,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to pay that price for the value it would bring to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is considerably higher than your offer. I could consider letting it go for $15,000.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $12,500 for the product. That's the maximum I'm comfortable with.
